description: Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement

## Department of National Defence (DND)
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services.

## Eligible Suppliers
The following Supply Arrangement (SA) holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. CyberVisor Corporation
2. DLS Technology Corporation
3. Excel Human Resources Inc.
4. MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. in Joint Venture
5. Mindwire Systems Ltd.
6. Modis Canada Inc
7. Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
8. Quallium Corporation
9. Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
10. The AIM Group Inc.
11. Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
12. TRM Technologies Inc.

## Description of the Requirement
The Department of National Defence (DND) and the Digital Transformation Office (DTO) have a requirement for Temporary Help Services. A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued to suppliers who are qualified under the specified streams and categories.

## Level of Security Requirement
Resources with a minimum security level of "Secret" are required.

## Expected Contract Duration
The proposed period of contract will be from July 17, 2023 to 48 weeks thereafter.

## Estimated Level of Effort
The estimated level of effort for the contract will be 7.5 hours per day, equivalent to 37.5 hours per week.

## Contact Information
PehSan Chuah
Department of National Defence
285 Coventry Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1K 4M7
Phone: (613) 406-1254
Email: [pehsan.chuah@forces.gc.ca](mailto:pehsan.chuah@forces.gc.ca)

## Location of Work
Region: National Capital Region (NCR)
Specific Location: National Defence Headquarters, 285 Coventry Dr., Ottawa, Ontario.

## Request for Proposal
Suppliers who wish to be considered for this procurement must submit their proposal directly to the Department of National Defence. Bidders should note that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System. Interested suppliers may contact: tpsgc.pasat-apths.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to inquire about becoming a qualified Supply Arrangement holder.
